name: ISOLARION
description:
"Hello wizard.

So you want to be the new master of the ISOLARION? The one who mastered the art of isolation.

Go for it, proof that you are worthy and master all the 25 tasks.

I believe in you.

I will wait."

ISOLARION is a mystery puzzle game, playable on PC with mouse and keyboard. Use the magic shapes and isolate the souls, because every soul has to live for their own.
This Isolation themed game jam game is made for all puzzle fans and wizards.

Made with Unity.

SourceCode: https://github.com/Assertores/Isolarion

Move Shapes: Drag and drop with mouse

Rotate Shapes: Q & E
